title: Love Triangle
description: Gym junkie Dane has his eye on two women, Kelly and Lisa. One by one he hooks up with them, only to find himself in a dilemma. Now he has two women wanting to spend time with him. In order to please them both he invites Lisa and Kelly around to his place for drinks by the pool. That night the girls reveal their deepest desires and the action really starts to heat up. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
